description.@en: The art of deception, concealment and illusion are the backbone of Shadowmancy. As such, you find the darkness and evening fog more comforting than the light and sunny days.

effect.@en: You can now attempt to learn Magicks from the Arcana of Shadowmancy. In addition, you automatically learn one Petty and one Lesser Magick spell from the Arcana of Shadowmancy. You cannot cast Lesser Magick from the Arcana of Shadowmancy until you have two Skill Ranks in Incantation. You can continue to learn Generalist Magick. Finally, you may only ever use Arcana of Shadowmancy and cannot adopt any other Profession that gives different Arcana types.
